```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = TRUE, 
  message = FALSE, 
  warning = FALSE

```

```{r}
raw_df = 
  read.csv("data/significant-volcanic-eruption-database.csv", sep = ";") |>
  janitor::clean_names() |>
  select(-c(month, day, status, volcano_missing, volcano_missing_description)) |>
  mutate(
    flag_tsunami = case_match(flag_tsunami, "Tsunami"~ 1, "" ~ 0),
    flag_earthquake = case_match(flag_earthquake, "Earthquake"~ 1, "" ~ 0)
  )
```
